replies.body: Are you really a YOurmOm1 Or u an imposter!!??!?!?! If are really him prove it o_O
replies.body_tagged: Are you really a YOurmOm1 Or u an imposter!!??!?!?! If are really him prove it o_O

replies.body:
@FirstSintax.

I can cook egg 

No i cannot sew.

No i wont take my clothes off

@ Snowcone. Still dont beleive me? Ill prove it.

Y0urm0m1.

25 + 0-21+ 18-13+0-13+1= 10.   Now. There is 8 characters in Y0urm0m1. Subtract by 8. 

10-8 =2.

You get 2. Notice how there is 2 0's in the name.

2 zero's =2. Y0urm0m1 confirumed. Then, to check the answer, your emoji would probably be 0_0 or something. That under score represent's a vertical 1 and the eyes are the 2 zero's in my name.

Proved it.
